title: Travian Renders (Transparent)
description:
These are transparent (No background, rendered) PNG images for Travian. GFX makers will need these, and i'm not sure if you'd find these anywhere on the web.

I took these images from one of travian's developers.




*These are images of ALL the army units in travian.


Contents: 

27 PNG renders:


Gauls:
1-Chieftain.
2-Druidrider.
3-Haeduan.
4-Pathfinder.
5-Phalanx.
6-Ram.
7-Swordsmen.
8-Theutates Thunder.
9-Trebuchet.


Romans:
1-Battering Ram.
2-Equites Caesaris.
3-Equites Imperiatoris.
4-Equites Legati.
5-Fire Catapult.
6-Imperian.
7-Legionnaire.
8-Praetorian.
9-Senator.


Teutons:
1-Axeman.
2-Catapult.
3-Chieftain.
4-Clubswinger.
5-Paladin.
6-Ram.
7-Scout.
8-Spearmen.
9-Teutonic knight.
